entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer focused on building scalable, intelligent platforms. We merge tech, marketing, and agriculture to drive growth, especially in underserved and rural markets. This work is built on FOSS principles.

projects.name: MedConnect
projects.description: An open-source healthtech platform that provides AI diagnostics and patient management to improve health access and data-driven care in rural communities.

channels.description: Support our collection of FOSS projects through our Open Collective page. All funds are publicly accounted for and directly support project growth and maintenance.

plans.name: General MedConnect Support
plans.description: A recurring contribution to cover essential operational costs like server hosting and maintenance for the MedConnect project.

plans.name: AI Model Development Grant
plans.description: A one-time grant to accelerate the development and training of new AI diagnostic models for early disease detection.
